overview:
Daisuke Mizuta is a founder,CEO of REVENTIVE,Inc. REVENTIVE is the youngest(Avarage age is 21years old) vigor social comapny in Japan. The mission of REVENTIVE is to make experience of serendipity in social network. And developing the evolutionary mobile platform service from kyoto to the world.

While in college,He etablished REVENITVE,Inc at Delaware 9.2011. And I fundraised angel round by After half a year,and I REVENITVE moved to silicion valley.And we attend the trade show of SXSW2012 and the alpha pitch at DEMO Asia.

I’m now developing the new evolutionary mobile communication platform”Qualia”. This service has truely new social network system we call intensive network.Please stay tuned:)
